TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Compiler extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider and System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler. The CSharpCodeProvider and CodeDom ICodeCompiler provide a much richer set of functionality for specifying how to launch the compiler.")

summary.span: C# 编译器的托管包装器。

span.span: Managed wrapper for the C# compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要编译 C\#代码在进程调用。To compile C\# code in-process, call .

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[] Compile (string[] sourceTexts, string[] sourceTextNames, string target, string[] imports, System.Collections.IDictionary options);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[] Compile(string[] sourceTexts, string[] sourceTextNames, string target, string[] imports, class System.Collections.IDictionary options) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compile (sourceTexts As String(), sourceTextNames As String(), target As String, imports As String(), options As IDictionary) As CompilerError()

public: static cli::array <Microsoft::CSharp::CompilerError ^> ^ Compile(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ sourceTexts, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ sourceTextNames, System::String ^ target, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ imports, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ options);
static member Compile : string[] * string[] * string * string[] * System.Collections.IDictionary -> Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[]

param.name: sourceTexts
param.span: 类型字符串数组，每一个均使用 C\# 代码。

span.span: An array of type string, each with C\# code.

param.name: sourceTextNames
param.span: 包含每个 sourceTexts 的文件名的类型字符串数组。

span.span: An array of type string that contains the file names for each sourceTexts.

param.name: imports
param.span: 类型字符串数组，含要引用的文件。

span.span: An array of type string, with files to reference.

summary.span: 编译指定的目标文件的给定 C# 源。

span.span: Compiles the given C# sources to the specified destination file.

returns.span: 将诊断消息作为 类型的数组返回。

span.span: Returns diagnostic messages as an array of type .

returns.span: 数组为空或所有元素都为警告，表示编译成功。

span.span: If the array is empty or all elements are warnings, the compilation succeeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SourceTexts 参数中的每个字符串是单个源文件的等效项。Each string in the sourceTexts parameter is the equivalent of a single source file. 必须有至少一个 sourceTexts 元素。There must be at least one sourceTexts element. SourceTextNames 参数中的文件名称使用的编译器诊断和调试信息。The file names in the sourceTextNames parameter are used for compiler diagnostics and debug information. 该数组是必需的但它可以在本地重写通过使用\#行指令。The array is required, but it can be locally overridden by use of the \#line directive. 该数组必须具有作为 sourceTexts 参数相同的元素数。The array must have the same number of elements as the sourceTexts parameter. 导入参数是 /reference 编译器选项相同。The imports parameter is the same as the /reference compiler option. 此参数可以为 。This parameter can be . 选项参数，该密钥是编译器选项的缩写形式。For the options parameter, the key is the short form of the compiler option. 值是所需的选项的值。The value is the value desired for the option. 选项参数可以是。The options parameter can be . 无法识别某些编译器选项。Some compiler options are not recognized. 已识别的选项和值：Recognized options and value: | 键名Key Name | 用法Usage | | --- | --- | | addmoduleaddmodule | 要包括在此程序集中的模块的列表。List of modules to include in this assembly. 模块名称必须由竖线或管道字符分隔。The module names must be separated by the vertical bar or pipe character. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-addmodule (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1s46f83c)。See [-addmodule (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1s46f83c). | | baseaddressbaseaddress | 库的基址。Base address for libraries. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-baseaddress (C#编译器选项)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option.md)。See [-baseaddress (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option.md). | | bugreportbugreport | 生成 bug 报告文件。Produces bug report file. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-bugreport (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/kaky3xy9)。See [-bugreport (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/kaky3xy9). | | checkedchecked | 设置默认表达式计算为选中 （或未选中状态）。Set default expression evaluation to checked (or unchecked). 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-检查 (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/h25wtyxf)。See [-checked (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/h25wtyxf). | | dd | 以分号分隔列表来定义的符号。List of semicolon separated symbols to define. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-定义 (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0feaad6z)。See [-define (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0feaad6z). | | 调试debug | 发出调试信息输出。Emit debug information with output. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 不能指定完整或仅 pdb。Full or pdb-only cannot be specified. 请参阅[-调试 (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8cw0bt21)。See [-debug (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8cw0bt21). | | 文档doc | 要插入 XML 注释的文件名称。File name to put XML comments in. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-doc (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3260k4x7)。See [-doc (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3260k4x7). | | filealignfilealign | PE 节对齐的大小。PE section alignment size. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-filealign (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0s4tzdf2)。See [-filealign (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0s4tzdf2). | | incrincr | 启用增量重新生成。Enable incremental rebuild. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . | | liblib | 若要查找模块和引用的程序集时搜索的其他路径。Additional paths to search when locating modules and referenced assemblies. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-lib (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/s5bac5fx)。See [-lib (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/s5bac5fx). | | linkreslinkres | 托管的资源链接到该程序集。Link a managed resource to the assembly. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-linkresource (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/xawyf94k)。See [-linkresource (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/xawyf94k). | | mm | 要搜索的 Main 方法中的类型。Type to search in for the Main method. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-主 (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/x3eht538)。See [-main (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/x3eht538). | | nostdlibnostdlib | 执行不自动引用 mscorlib.dll。Do not auto-reference mscorlib.dll. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-nostdlib (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa13yay7)。See [-nostdlib (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa13yay7). | | nowarnnowarn | 以分号分隔列表不进行报告的警告编号。List of semicolon separated warning numbers to not report. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-nowarn (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f28x9z3)。See [-nowarn (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f28x9z3). | | oo | 启用编译器优化。Enable compiler optimizations. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-优化 (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/t0hfscdc)。See [-optimize (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/t0hfscdc). | | rr | 引用的程序集。Referenced assemblies. 值必须是字符串类型。Value must be of type String. 如果指定多个程序集，则必须用竖线或管道字符分隔的文件的名称。If more than one assembly is specified, the file name must be separated by the vertical bar or pipe character. 请参阅[的引用 (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/yabyz3h4)。See [-reference (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/yabyz3h4). | | resres | 嵌入托管的资源。Embed a managed resource. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-资源 (C#编译器选项)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option.md)。See [-resource (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option.md). | | targettarget | 输出文件目标类型，以下项之一:"库"、"exe"、"winexe"或"模块"。Output file target type, one of the following: "library", "exe", "winexe", or "module". 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-目标 (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6h25dztx)。See [-target (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6h25dztx). | | unsafeunsafe | 允许不安全的构造。Allow unsafe constructs. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-不安全 (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ct597kb0)。See [-unsafe (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ct597kb0). | | ww | 警告等级 (0-4)。Warning level (0-4). 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[的则发出警告 (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13b90fz7)。See [-warn (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13b90fz7). | | warnaserrorwarnaserror | 为错误报告警告诊断。Report warning diagnostics as errors. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-warnaserror (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/406xhdz3)。See [-warnaserror (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/406xhdz3). | | win32iconwin32icon | Win32 图标的自动生成 Win32 资源。Win32 icon for auto generated Win32 resource. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-win32icon (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2aaxe43f)。See [-win32icon (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2aaxe43f). | | win32reswin32res | Win32 资源文件。Win32 resource file. 值必须为类型。Value must be of type . 请参阅[-win32res (C#编译器选项)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f2f5x2e)。See [-win32res (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f2f5x2e). |

span.span: is not the same size as .
